books.title: myy
books.author: neha
books.description:
✔ Encapsulation: Divides functionality into reusable functions.
✔ Efficiency: Uses re.sub() for word replacement, making it safer and more accurate.
✔ Error Handling: Ensures valid input before processing.
✔ Better UI/UX: Improves session state handling and structured display of statistics.
